verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Broken, mocked and stoned
was a man hanging from a cross
with a crown of thorns

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Who is He, this man who died for me
his given Son who was born to die
so we could be redeemed

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
He died for you
He died for me
He took my pain and he bought my shame
that day on Calvary
The bleeding One, Gods only Son
What kind of man is this
who walked this road alone
Jesus

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
It was supposed to be me
hanging from that tree
it was my sin, that crucified him
I dont deserve any mercy

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
But as we come to you today
we remember what you gave
through His bleeding word
you have revealed to us our names

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: I didn't see but I believe
